300005.「お集まりの 皆さまぁ～っ！ 記念すべき\n 第１０回 アストルティア・ナイト\:
Laaadies and gentlemen! I'd now like to
introduce you to the contestants of the 10th
Astoltia Knight Contest!

300006.「前大会で 好成績をおさめ \n 見事 出場権を獲得した ３名に加えて～……:
And now, joining the 3 winners from
last year's tournament...

300007.「ファルパパ神による特別推薦枠 ２名と！\n 総勢４８人の予選を 勝ち抜いた３名:
We've got 2 special recommendations from
Falpapa himself, as well as 3 winners from 48
contestants! 8 hotcakes will battle it out!

300008.「まずは 前大会の覇者の 入場だぁっ！\n 苦節９年！ キュートの代名詞たる プ:
First up, we have last year's winner, 9 years
in the making! Will this prince, the epitome
of cute, defend his title?!

300009.「見た目はキュート！ 生い立ちハード！\n 酸いも甘いも かみ分けまくりの\n:
Cute on the outside, but stern on the inside!
The heir to Megistris who is both sweet and
sour... Prince Raguas!

300010.「ようこそ ホワイトショコラ城へ！\n 前回の アストルティア・ナイトである ぼ:
Welcome to the castle, everyone! As the
previous Astoltia Knight, I, Raguas, would
like to extend a warm welcome.

300011.「……と 堅苦しい あいさつは ここまでです。\n ぼくたち 今年も とびっきり:
...Sorry, but that's all for the formalities.
We've made some really wonderful sweets this
year with much love and care!

300012.「よかったら ぼくの クッキーを\n 一番最初に 味見しにきて くださいねっ。\:
I hope you'll be the first to taste my
special cookies. Hehe... it's a promise!

300013.「さぁっ！ 準ナイトの おでましだぁ～っ！！\n クールなフェイスに 熱きハート:
Now! Here comes our junior knight! The cool
faced, hot blooded, amphibious Weddie hunk
we all know and love!

300014.「上位常連である 歴戦の実力者は\n 今年こそ ナイトの座を 奪還できるか！？\:
Can this top ranker reclaim his title this
year?! The lone swordsman who appears
and disappears as he pleases! Hyuza!

300015.「前回は 長年のライバル ラグアス王子が\n アストルティア・ナイトになって\n:
Last time, my long time rival Raguas finally
became an Astoltia Knight. Congrats on your
win... I was happy to see it.

300016.「……だが ここからは 真剣勝負だ。: But now... it's time to get serious.

300017.「記念すべき 第１０回 アストルティア・ナイト\n ……その称号に ふさわしいの:
The title of 10th Astoltia Knight is sure to
be a memorable one... so I think I'm the only
one worthy. You all think so too, right?

300018.「はっはっは！\n たいした自信だが そう簡単には いかせない。:
Hahaha! Quite the confident one you are,
but I won't let you off that easy.

300019.「おお～っと！？\n ここで！ 前回３位の この男が\n またまた今年も 妙なト:
What do we have here?! The man who placed
third last year barges in again from who knows
where!

300020.「不敵な笑顔と 紅蓮の髪！\n キケンな香りに しもべ志願が １００人待ち！\n:
With a daring smile and hair as red as fire! A
dangerous scent that has 100 hopeful servants
waiting! Aiming for the title of Knight!

300021.「五種族 竜族 魔族に天使 全員まとめて\n メロッメロに しちまいな～っ！！\:
Melting the hearts of the five races, dragons,
demons, and angels alike! The Demon World's
bold soldier of fortune, Yushka!

300022.「副官が ナイトに なってるってのに\n 俺が ふがいないままじゃ 魔界の連中に:
My second-in-command has been knighted... so
if I lose here, the Demon World will ridicule
me. This year, it's all out serious mode!

300023.「……来いよ。\n 俺と クッキーの契約を 結ぼう。: Come here... let us make a cookie pact.

300024.「あなたの覚悟 しかと 受け止めました。\n ……ならば 私も\n 全力で お相:
I can feel your strong determination
this time. Very well... I shall also be your
opponent!

300025.「挑戦するは 予選上位の この男～っ！\n 今年の運命の女神は ニコイチ主従の\:
This challenger ranked high in the prelims!
Which man of this dynamic master-servant duo
will the goddess of fate smile upon?!

300026.「おカタい副官の 甘いささやきが 聞けるのは\n ナイトコンテスト限定の レアも:
Hearing sweet whispers from this stubborn
servant is music to your ears, isn't it? The
One-Eyed Wonder... Nazine!

300027.「アストルティアの みなさん。\n 今年も お招きにあずかり 感謝する。:
Ladies and gentlemen of Astoltia... thank you
for your invitation again this year.

300028.「さあ ふたたび 我が手を取りたまえ。\n 魔界と アストルティア ふたつの世界:
Take my hand once more. Let us embrace the
unity between Astoltia and the Demon
World...

300029.「まだまだ 予選突破の猛者は 続くぜぇ～っ！\n お次は みんな お待ちかねっ！:
The fierce preliminary competitors keep
coming! And now, the moment everyone's been
waiting for! Next we have...!

300030.「瞳の真実 ゴーグルに隠し～っ！\n 探究するは 奇跡の秘宝か 永遠の愛か！？\:
Concealing the truth behind those goggles!
Will he find treasure or true love?! The
exceptional explorer, Raul!

300031.「……みな いい面構えをしているな。\n 相手にとって 不足はない。:
Everyone here has a good look about them...
There's no shortage of fierce opponents.

300032.「俺は 今一度 ナイトの座に挑む！\n 応援してくれた 皆のために……\n いや:
I once again aim for the title of Knight! To
everyone who's supported me... No. That's just
an excuse. I'm doing this for myself.

300033.「失ってしまった 大切なものを\n なんとしても 取り戻したいんだ……。\n ど:
There is something that I lost that I must
reclaim... Everyone, please lend me your
strength!

300034.「予選を突破した参加者 ラストは\n おひさしぶりの コイツの登場だぁ～っ！！:
The last of our qualifiers is a guy who we
haven't seen in quite some time!

300035.「頭脳で勝負なら 優勝確実！\n ナイトコンテスト攻略計画は 長き眠りの間に\n:
If it's a battle of wits, he's sure to win!
He's had a long time sleeping to plan his
strategy, with a lot of tricks up his sleeve!

300036.「マッドなパパと スイートなママ♪ の\n 愛の結晶は 栄光を つかめるのか～っ:
With a crazy father and sweet mother... will
the fruits of true love find glory?! The
Prophesied Prognosticator, Pukulas!

300037.「この 楽しい催しに また参加できるなんて\n すごく光栄だよ！ みんな ボクの:
I'm honored to be able to participate in such
a fun event again. Thank you, everyone, for
continuing to support me.

300038.「この日のために 食べると 幸福になれる\n おいしいクッキーの レシピを\n:
I've created a special recipe for delicious
cookies that bring happiness when eaten, all
for this special day.

300039.「ボクの クッキーで\n みんなも おいしさ新発見♪ してほしいな。\n それじ:
I want everyone to have a new, delicious
discovery with my cookies. I hope that you'll
try them!

300040.「予選上位組は ここまで！\n さあさあ お次は ファルパパちゃんによる\n 特:
And those are all the top qualifiers! Next,
I'd like to introduce the two specially
recommended by Falpapa!

300041.「デコっぱちも ズッ友も コイツが元祖！\n なのに まさかの 初登場！？\n:
With the flashy decorations and the best of
friends, this guy's the original! And yet,
it's his first time?! Let's take a look back!

300042.「もう あの頃の 子供じゃないっ！\n 破邪舟師のウデも ボディも 鍛えてきたじ:
He's no kid anymore! Training his skills as a
Ship Shaper and his body alike! The 500 year
old friend, Erju!

300043.「ここで お菓子を配ることが\n アストルティアの平和に つながるって\n 師に:
My master told me that giving out sweets here
could lead to peace in Astoltia, but... is
that really true?

300044.「……まあいい。これも 修行の一環だ。\n やると決めたからには\n 全力で や:
But, it's fine. This is part of my training,
so I will do everything in my power to
see it through to the end!

300045.「来い！ ボクの クッキーは\n 逃げも隠れも しないぞ！\n すべての種族の:
Come on! My cookies won't run nor hide! I'll
be the bridge that connects all races!

300046.「ラストは 特別推薦枠２人目の コイツだぁっ！\n まばたき厳禁！ 最後の参加者:
And last but not least, the second of our
recommendations! Don't blink! You don't want
to miss our final contestant!

300047.「勇者と盟友の伝説は ここから 始まったぁ！\n どんな 過酷な運命だって\n:
The legend of the Hero and their ally began
here! No matter how harsh the fate, the power
of the Hero can overcome it!

300048.「大魔王には めっぽう強いが\n 盟友にゃ弱い おひとよし～っ！！\n 光と影の:
Strong against the Great Demon King, but not
so much against his sworn ally! The first
Hero of light and shadow, Ashley!

300049.「なんだよ……レオの奴 来てねぇのか？\n ちょっとぐらい 兄ちゃんを 応援して:
Really...? Leo still isn't here? I didn't
think it'd be such a hassle to cheer on your
brother even just a little bit...

300050.「おっと すまねぇな。\n ハイカラな祭りに 招いてくれて ありがとよ！\n 俺:
Oops, sorry. Thanks for inviting me to such a
fantastic festival! I'm the first Hero, as
they say.

300051.「勝負ってのは 勝たなきゃ 意味がねぇ！\n 当然 ナイトの座を 狙ってくつもり:
Winning means everything in the heat of battle! I'll definitely win the title of Knight this year! You'll see what a Hero can
do!

300052.「以上っ！ ８名の 個性豊かな参加者たちが\n アストルティア・ナイトの座をかけ:
And that's it! These eight unique participants
will duke it out for the coveted throne of
the Astoltia Knight!

300053.「栄光の座に かがやくのは 誰か……\n それを決めるのは！\n こ・こ・に・い:
Who will be crowned with glory...? It's up to
you to decide! All! Of! You!

300054.「さ～て どう？ どう？ <pc>。 \n ちょー スゴいヤツらが 大集合だけど:
Well? Well? There are so many amazing choices
this year, but which one is your honest
favorite?

300055.「アストルティア・ナイトに ふさわしいと思う \n 参加者を選んだら\n キミの:
When you've made your choice of who you think
is worthy, make sure to cast your vote!

300056.「投票は 私の カワイイ妹っ！\n 集計係モカの所で 受け付けてるからね！: Give your votes to my cute sister, Mocha!

300057.「ナイトに 投票し終わったら\n 話すことがあるから メリルの所に 来るべし！\:
After you've chosen your votes, come see me!
I'll be waiting for you outside, I promise!

300058.「じゃじゃーん！ 記念すべき\n 第１０回 アストルティア・ナイト\n コンテス:
Ta-dah! I will now announce the results of
the 10th Astoltia Knight Contest!

300059.「さあさあ！ ホワイトショコラ城の\n ナイトの座は 誰の手に！？\n 耳の穴か:
Come, now! Who will be the Knight of the
White Chocolate Castle? Clear your ears and
listen well!

300060.「いっくよ～！\n みんなっ ステージに 注目するべし～っ！！: Here we go! Everyone, please watch the stage!
